problem.markdown:
1. The maximum generated voltage in power generating stations in advanced countries is 33kV while that in India is _________
() 6kV (x) 11kV () 9kV () 44kV
2. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
() 2 times lesser than (x) Greater than () Lesser than () Equal to
3. Copper conductor is _____________
(x) All () It has high current density, so lesser X-sectional area of conductor is required () Homogenous material () Highly durable and has high scrap value
4. The transmission lines are _____________
() None of them () 2-phase 2-wire circuits () 3-phase 3-wire circuits (x) 3-phase 4-wire circuits
5. The transmission lines and feeders are _____________
() None of them (x) 3-phase 3-wire circuit () 3-phase 3-wire circuits () 2-phase 2-wire circuits
problem.p: 1. The maximum generated voltage in power generating stations in advanced countries is 33kV while that in India is _________
2. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.

choicegroup.choice: It has high current density, so lesser X-sectional area of conductor is required
Highly durable and has high scrap value

problem.p: 5. The transmission lines and feeders are _____________
